title: Hard-To-Change Mistakes Led To Successful 'No-Fly List' Case
teaser: This week, a federal judge ruled that the government's no-fly list process is unconstitutional. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with Abe Mashal, one of the 13 plaintiffs in the case.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
